snippet: The wide-ranging three-day Big Ears music festival returned to Knoxville after a three-year hiatus, with a range of music that let listeners define it as much as the performers and composers.
abstract: Ben Ratliff reviews performances at Big Ears music festival in Knoxville, Tenn.
lead_paragraph: The wide-ranging three-day Big Ears music festival returned to Knoxville after a three-year hiatus, with a range of music that let listeners define it as much as the performers and composers.

headline.seo: The Big Ears Festival Returns in Knoxville
